isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 37
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Before installing cab door vapor barrier (Item 2), check to make sure it is not damaged. Replace it if it is damaged.
Carefully install wiring harness and electric connectors (Item 4) through cab door vapor barrier (Item 2), driver side shown.
Carefully install the cab door vapor barrier (Item 2) back on the cab door (Item 3) and press to secure. Make sure it is positioned properly before installing the cab door trim panel (Item 1).

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door vapor barrier with electric door window and locks.

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 38
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Before installing cab door vapor barrier (Item 2), check to make sure it is not damaged. Replace it if it is damaged.
Carefully install cab door vapor barrier (Item 2) over window regulator shaft (Item 4), driver side shown.
Carefully install the cab door vapor barrier (Item 2) back on the cab door (Item 3) and press to secure. Make sure it is positioned properly before installing the cab door trim panel (Item 1).

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door vapor barrier with manual door window and locks.
